data.name: Dynamic Spanish Trips - Long Weekend in Spain
data.app_name: Dynamic Spanish Trips - Long Weekend in Spain
data.description:
Explore Spain while speaking Spanish!

Go on a "Long Weekend in Spain" using your Oculus Go to explore 4 places in a series of 360 videos and photos, using AI speech recognition to practise your pronunciation.

Discover the culture, history, and language in immersive, interactive videos and photos!

We have FREE online materials (transcripts, additional activities) that you can access by signing up using the links in the app.

We also have MORE Trips to explore and you can find out how update your app at VRLanguages.co.uk.

We also have a beginner Spanish VR course.

VR Languages Co-Founders are HUGE fans of the Oculus Go and will support the brilliant headset through 2022. We also offer cross-buy so if you buy our Full app for Go, then upgrade your headset later, we'll give you access on your new headset.

We're a small team with big hearts that want to make learning Spanish as fun as possible!
